attributes.action: Permit NHS patients to pay for additional treatments, not currently funded by the NHS, without having to pay for ALL medical treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The arguement against this is that, allowing patients to pay for extra treatment would lead to a two tier system.  This is as rediculous as making pupils leave state schools if they take extra paid-for tuition or even buying a PC or encyclopaedia. Such patients are not asking for any preferential treatment nor anything more from the NHS than that to which they would otherwise be entitled.
